content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate factory at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x=61.0, y=-52.0)
- Stone furnace (position x=63.0, y=-52.0)
- Stone furnace (position x=65.0, y=-52.0)

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=-28.5, y=-61.5)
- Burner mining drill (position x=34.5, y=-89.5)

### Coal mine at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=34.5, y=-89.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items from inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a furnace. Check your inventory before performing the insert operation.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. Check if the tile is occupied by another entity.

### Errors related to furnace inventory being full
- Monitor the inventory of the furnaces to avoid trying to insert items when they are already full.
